scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp -r src/Components/Icons/eva dist/Icons && cp src/Components/Icons/Logo.svg dist/Icons && babel --presets @babel/react --plugins macros,@babel/transform-modules-commonjs,@babel/syntax-dynamic-import --out-dir dist dist && rm -rf dist/Icons/eva dist/Icons/Logo.svg && node -e "(() => { const {name, version, dependencies, peerDependencies} = require('./package.json'), pkg = {name, version, dependencies, peerDependencies}; require('fs').writeFileSync('dist/package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2)) })()"
